title: Valterra RV Water Regulator, Lead-Free Brass Water Regulator for Camper, Trailer, RV Plumbing System, 40-50 psi
description: Regulate your RV's water pressure with the Valterra Lead-Free Brass Water Regulator! The adapter regulates incoming water pressure to 40-50 psi, the ideal pressure for your needs. The water regulator attaches to the campground water spigot and reduces the water pressure that feeds through the water hose into the RV. It protects both the hose and the RV from high pressure and prevents pipes from bursting. With a lead-free brass construction, you can be confident in the safety and quality of your attachment water regulator. The Valterra Lead-Free Brass Water Regulator conforms with federal and state laws for drinking water fixtures, making it the ideal addition to your RV.
